text: Alanson W. Willcox is an American lawyer who is a former general counsel to the U.S. Department of Health, Education and Welfare. Willcox was born in Akron Ohio, in 1931, graduated from The Hill School in 1918, Cornell in 1922, and Harvard Law School in 1926. At Cornell, he was a member of Psi Upsilon ==References== Category:The Hill School alumni Category:Cornell University alumni Category:Alumni of the University of Cambridge Category:Harvard Law School alumni Category:1901 births Category:Year of death missing
title: Alan Willcox
